momoco-basic.name: Wonder MOMOCO
momoco-basic.description: His wanderings through the abyss have driven him mad with infernal ambitions. Tremendous damage to a single enemy.

lesserdemon-basic.name: Lesser Demon Cat
lesserdemon-basic.description: A mad cat that sacrificed itself to a demon from the netherworld. Attacks with extreme force.

lesserdemon-evolved.name: Greater Demon Cat
lesserdemon-evolved.description: The mad cat managed to control the demon from the netherworld. Attacks with extreme force.

lesserdemon-true.description: His wanderings through the abyss have driven him mad with infernal ambitions. Tremendous damage to a single enemy.
